thread.title: "Top class hotel in great location"
thread.title_full: "Top class hotel in great location" - Review of St Martins Lane London Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Olivia035
title: "Top class hotel in great location"
text: This was our second visit to this hotel and we were not disappointed. All the staff were friendly and helpful. Our room was in the corner of the hotel so was very quite and spacious. The hotel is in a great location and the hidden cocktail bar is very special. We really enjoyed our stay and will be returning as certainly our favourite hotel in London.
